get.description: Returns a list of your call recordings.

parameters.name: filter[conference_id]
parameters.description: Returns only recordings associated with a given conference

parameters.name: filter[created_at][gte]
parameters.description: Returns only recordings created later than or at given ISO 8601 datetime

parameters.name: filter[created_at][lte]
parameters.description: Returns only recordings created earlier than or at given ISO 8601 datetime

parameters.name: filter[call_leg_id]
parameters.description: If present, recordings will be filtered to those with a matching call_leg_id.

parameters.name: filter[call_session_id]
parameters.description: If present, recordings will be filtered to those with a matching call_session_id.

parameters.name: filter[from]
parameters.description: If present, recordings will be filtered to those with a matching `from` attribute. Matching is case-sensitive

parameters.name: filter[to]
parameters.description: If present, recordings will be filtered to those with a matching `to` attribute. Matching is case-sensitive

parameters.name: filter[connection_id]
parameters.description: If present, recordings will be filtered to those with a matching `connection_id` attribute. Matching is case-sensitive
